metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1963 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.4 before 14.10.5, all versions starting from 15.0 before15.0.4, all versions starting from 15.1 before 15.1.1. GitLab reveals if auser has enabled two-factor authentication on their account in the HTMLsource, to unauthenticated users.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
